SEARCH

Class CardHand<C>

java.lang.Object
CardHand<C>
Type Parameters:
C - the type of items in this hand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Hand<C>
public class CardHand<C> extends Object implements Hand<C>
Represents a generic hand of cards or other items. This class allows manipulation of items such as adding, removing, and sorting.
